author: Tony Boyd
title: Global tech immune to virus - The Australian Financial Review
description: Each time a market crashes, investors want to buy bargains, but this is impossible to pick and experts say find quality companies and buy when they are cheaper.
content:
Oaktree's investment strategy has always tried to strike a balance between offence and defence, which involves thinking about twin risks: the risk of losing money and the risk of missing opportunities.
Marks says defence should no longer be favoured these da… [+3005 chars]
